goal.en:
"""Practical Thesis"" is a required course and the capstone course for the Part-Time MBA program in the department of Information Management.
Its objective is to integrate management knowledge and information technology from courses and practical experiences
to solve managerial decision problems."
goal.ch:
本課程為資管系碩士在職專班必修之論文學分，也是所授予商管碩士(MBA)學位之頂點 (capstone) 課程。
實務性論文的課程目標在於整合MBA學程所學知識和實務經驗以解決公司的經營管理和決策問題。

content.en:
"Part-Time MBA students are advised by full-time faculty to conduct a research to solve a managerial decision probelm.
The contents of the thesis should include: research background and motivation, research purpose and questions,
literature review, research methodology, data collection and analysis or system implementation, research results or system demo,
research conclusion and practical implications. Conference for thesis proposals will be held during the semester."
content.ch:
係由本系專任教師擔任在職專班學生的指導教授，依據學術性論文的要求進行管理實務問題的研究。
論文內容應涵蓋研究背景和動機、研究目的和問題、文獻探討、研究方法或步驟、資料收集分析或系統實作、
研究發現或系統展示、研究結論與實務意涵等。論文計劃書(thesis proposal)將以研討會形式於期中發表和評論。
